entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is described as having a pale, pointed, sneering face and being in Slytherin House.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as playing Seeker on the Gryffindor team.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is described as being taller with a pudding-bowl haircut and a very thick neck.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is described as having short, bristly hair and long, gorilla-ish arms.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as standing up quickly when Malfoy insults his family.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks's basket is knocked to the floor by Ron.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin gives a snort when Malfoy insults Harry's family.

relationships.description: Draco and Harry have been enemies since they met on their first train journey to Hogwarts.
Malfoy is a member of Slytherin House.
Harry plays Seeker on the Gryffindor team.
Crabbe seems to exist to do Malfoy's bidding.
Goyle also seems to exist to do Malfoy's bidding.
Professor Lupin gives a snort in support of Harry when Malfoy insults his family.
Malfoy insults Ron's family, indicating they are enemies.
